casebody.data:
Joyce DAVIS, Plaintiff,
v.
Eric DAVIS, Defendant. M-535/536/537 September Term 2017
078643 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 16, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions of Michael S. Stein for leave to file a motion for counsel fees and costs as within time (M-535) and for a remand (M-537) are granted. The motion for counsel fees and costs (M-536) for work performed before the Supreme Court is referred to the trial court for consideration and disposition by that court. Jurisdiction is not retained.
